description: Try our easy to follow Thai Chicken Green Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Thai Chicken Green Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Serve Thai green curry chicken scattered with extra pistachios with jasmine rice, lime wedges and coriander sprigs. Tip 1: Swap chicken mince for beef or pork mince; fish or prawns. Tip 2: This curry is great served over thick rice noodles. Tip 3: Swap the green curry paste for red curry paste and the shallots and pistachios for roasted red capsicum and peanuts.
